DOC.brief_summary: Goal study test hypothesis repeat exposure cycle insufficient sleep increase susceptibility variety disease state progressively compromise integrity stress response system .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 30 kg/m2 For female participant : regular menstrual cycle Daily sleep duration normal range Blood chemistry normal range Active infection/disease History psychiatric , neurological , painrelated , immune , cardiovascular disease ; significant allergy Pregnant/nursing Respiratory disturbance index > 5 events/hour polysomnographic sleep study , leg movement arousal > 10/hour ; sleep efficiency < 80 % Regular medication use oral contraceptive Donation blood platelet 3 month prior inbetween study arm
